faq.question: What types of policy documents does it support?
faq.answer: All types: HR policies, compliance manuals, regulatory guidelines, government regulations, industry standards, and corporate policies.

faq.question: Can it identify compliance deadlines?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI extracts all dates, deadlines, reporting periods, and time-sensitive requirements from policy documents.

faq.question: Does it work with updated policies?
faq.answer: Yes! Upload both old and new versions to get a summary of what changed, making policy updates easier to communicate.

faq.question: Can I share summaries with employees?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Team plans include sharing features perfect for distributing policy summaries to staff.

faq.question: Is it secure for sensitive policies?
faq.answer: Yes! Enterprise-grade encryption, SOC 2 compliance, and we never train on your data.
